name: The black magician
description:
Hello, everyone

It's HaruGeen, with a new game for test purposes. But, this time this game is actually playable and hard.

So, the game is small and not a big project or anything it's just one of my test projects.

However, it's totally playable and you can challenge your friends to last 3 minutes in this game if they do then they're so good and have great reaction time.
